pages.title: Castle Doran
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Kiva (2008, TV show)$(br2)Spawn locations: Birch Forest, Dark Forest, Flower Forest, Forest, Grove, Old Growth Birch Forest, Mushroom Fields$(br2)Chest loot on next page

Chest loot:$(li)4-10 $(l:kiva/items/fuestle)Fuestles$(/l) (50% x2-3)$(li)4-6 bones (25% x2-3)$(li)2-6 $(l:misc/blocks/fangire_glass)Fangire Glass$(/l) (25% x2-3)$(li)1-2 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#wakeupfuestle)Wake Up Fuestles (Kiva)$(/l)$(li)1-2 $(l:kiva/arsenal/garulu_statue)Garulu$(/l), $(l:kiva/arsenal/basshaa_statue)Basshaa$(/l), or $(l:kiva/arsenal/dogga_statue)Dogga Statues$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:misc/items/music_discs#break_the_chain_music_disc)Break the Chain Music Disc$(/l), $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#doranfuestle)???$(/l), or $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#buroonfuestle)???$(/l) (50%)
